mapper.select: SELECT zhujiid as albumId, zname as aname, js, songerid, fxgs, fbtime, cjtime, img, songer.sname as singername FROM zhuanji, songer WHERE zhuanji.songerid = songer.sid AND zhujiid =#{id}

select zhuanji.zhujiid as albumId, zhuanji.img, zhuanji.zname as aname
from zhuanji ,collectzhuanji c
where c.uid=#{searchParam} and zhuanji.zhujiid=c.sid
select song.sid, song.sname, song.song, song.img, t.name as typeName, song.fbtime from song ,type t where song.type=t.tid and song.zjid=#{0};

select
zhuanji.zhujiid as albumId
zhuanji.zhujiid as albumId, zhuanji.zname as aname, zhuanji.fxgs, zhuanji.fbtime, zhuanji.img
from zhuanji
order by zhuanji.fbtime desc LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
